ABOUTME.INTRODUCTION: I am a frontend developer living in Cuxhaven. I am passionate about technology and love designing great things.
ABOUTME.BE_TOGETHER: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

MYWORK.HEADLINE: My work
MYWORK.SECTION_DESCRIPTION: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with project to see my skills in action
MYWORK.JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
MYWORK.POLLO_LOCO_DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
MYWORK.POKEDEX_DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact
CONTACT.CONTACT_ME: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_POLICY: I´ve read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as outlined
